verses.verse: And Israel<WH3478> took his journey<WH5265> with all that he had, and came<WH935> to Beer-sheba<WH884>, and offered<WH2076> sacrifices<WH2077> unto the God<WH430> of his father<WH1> Isaac<WH3327>.
And God<WH430> spake<WH559> unto Israel<WH3478> in the visions<WH4759> of the night<WH3915>, and said<WH559>, Jacob<WH3290>, Jacob<WH3290>. And he said<WH559>, Here am I.
And he said<WH559>, I am God<WH410>, the God<WH430> of thy father<WH1>: fear<WH3372> not to go down<WH3381> into Egypt<WH4714>; for I will there make<WH7760> of thee a great<WH1419> nation<WH1471>:
I will go down<WH3381> with thee into Egypt<WH4714>; and I will also surely<WH5927> bring thee up<WH5927> again: and Joseph<WH3130> shall put<WH7896> his hand<WH3027> upon thine eyes<WH5869>.

And Jacob<WH3290> rose up<WH6965> from Beer-sheba<WH884>: and the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> carried<WH5375> Jacob<WH3290> their father<WH1>, and their little ones<WH2945>, and their wives<WH802>, in the wagons<WH5699> which Pharaoh<WH6547> had sent<WH7971> to carry<WH5375> him.

And they took<WH3947> their cattle<WH4735>, and their goods<WH7399>, which they had gotten<WH7408> in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, and came<WH935> into Egypt<WH4714>, Jacob<WH3290>, and all his seed<WH2233> with him:
His sons<WH1121>, and his sons'<WH1121> sons<WH1121> with him, his daughters<WH1323>, and his sons'<WH1121> daughters<WH1323>, and all his seed<WH2233> brought he<WH935> with him into Egypt<WH4714>.

¶ And these are the names<WH8034> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, which came<WH935> into Egypt<WH4714>, Jacob<WH3290> and his sons<WH1121>: Reuben<WH7205>, Jacob's<WH3290> firstborn<WH1060>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205>; Hanoch<WH2585>, and Phallu<WH6396>, and Hezron<WH2696>, and Carmi<WH3756>.
¶ And the sons<WH1121> of Simeon<WH8095>; Jemuel<WH3223>, and Jamin<WH3226>, and Ohad<WH161>, and Jachin<WH3199>, and Zohar<WH6714>, and Shaul<WH7586> the son<WH1121> of a Canaanitish<WH3669> woman.
¶ And the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878>; Gershon<WH1648>, Kohath<WH6955>, and Merari<WH4847>.

¶ And the sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063>; Er<WH6147>, and Onan<WH209>, and Shelah<WH7956>, and Pharez<WH6557>, and Zerah<WH2226>: but Er<WH6147> and Onan<WH209> died<WH4191> in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>. And the sons<WH1121> of Pharez<WH6557> were Hezron<WH2696> and Hamul<WH2538>.
¶ And the sons<WH1121> of Issachar<WH3485>; Tola<WH8439>, and Phuvah<WH6312>, and Job<WH3102>, and Shimron<WH8110>.
¶ And the sons<WH1121> of Zebulun<WH2074>; Sered<WH5624>, and Elon<WH356>, and Jahleel<WH3177>.

These be the sons<WH1121> of Leah<WH3812>, which she bare<WH3205> unto Jacob<WH3290> in Padan-aram<WH6307>, with his daughter<WH1323> Dinah<WH1783>: all the souls<WH5315> of his sons<WH1121> and his daughters<WH1323> were thirty<WH7970> and three<WH7969>.
¶ And the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410>; Ziphion<WH6837>, and Haggi<WH2291>, Shuni<WH7764>, and Ezbon<WH675>, Eri<WH6179>, and Arodi<WH722>, and Areli<WH692>.

¶ And the sons<WH1121> of Asher<WH836>; Jimnah<WH3232>, and Ishuah<WH3438>, and Isui<WH3440>, and Beriah<WH1283>, and Serah<WH8294> their sister<WH269>: and the sons<WH1121> of Beriah<WH1283>; Heber<WH2268>, and Malchiel<WH4439>.

These are the sons<WH1121> of Zilpah<WH2153>, whom Laban<WH3837> gave<WH5414> to Leah<WH3812> his daughter<WH1323>, and these she bare<WH3205> unto Jacob<WH3290>, even sixteen<WH6240><WH8337> souls<WH5315>.
The sons<WH1121> of Rachel<WH7354> Jacob's<WH3290> wife<WH802>; Joseph<WH3130>, and Benjamin<WH1144>.

¶ And unto Joseph<WH3130> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> were born<WH3205> Manasseh<WH4519> and Ephraim<WH669>, which Asenath<WH621> the daughter<WH1323> of Poti-pherah<WH6319> priest<WH3548> of On<WH204> bare<WH3205> unto him.

¶ And the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> were Belah<WH1106>, and Becher<WH1071>, and Ashbel<WH788>, Gera<WH1617>, and Naaman<WH5283>, Ehi<WH278>, and Rosh<WH7220>, Muppim<WH4649>, and Huppim<WH2650>, and Ard<WH714>.
These are the sons<WH1121> of Rachel<WH7354>, which were born<WH3205> to Jacob<WH3290>: all the souls<WH5315> were fourteen<WH702><WH6240>.
¶ And the sons<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835>; Hushim<WH2366>.
¶ And the sons<WH1121> of Naphtali<WH5321>; Jahzeel<WH3183>, and Guni<WH1476>, and Jezer<WH3337>, and Shillem<WH8006>.

These are the sons<WH1121> of Bilhah<WH1090>, which Laban<WH3837> gave<WH5414> unto Rachel<WH7354> his daughter<WH1323>, and she bare<WH3205> these unto Jacob<WH3290>: all the souls<WH5315> were seven<WH7651>.

All the souls<WH5315> that came<WH935> with Jacob<WH3290> into Egypt<WH4714>, which came out<WH3318> of his loins<WH3409>, besides Jacob's<WH3290> sons'<WH1121> wives<WH802>, all the souls<WH5315> were threescore<WH8346> and six<WH8337>;

And the sons<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130>, which were born<WH3205> him in Egypt<WH4714>, were two<WH8147> souls<WH5315>: all the souls<WH5315> of the house<WH1004> of Jacob<WH3290>, which came<WH935> into Egypt<WH4714>, were threescore and ten<WH7657>.
¶ And he sent<WH7971> Judah<WH3063> before him<WH6440> unto Joseph<WH3130>, to direct<WH3384> his face<WH6440> unto Goshen<WH1657>; and they came<WH935> into the land<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657>.

And Joseph<WH3130> made ready<WH631> his chariot<WH4818>, and went up<WH5927> to meet<WH7125> Israel<WH3478> his father<WH1>, to Goshen<WH1657>, and presented<WH7200> himself unto him; and he fell<WH5307> on his neck<WH6677>, and wept<WH1058> on his neck<WH6677> a good while<WH5750>.
And Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> unto Joseph<WH3130>, Now<WH6471> let me die<WH4191>, since<WH310> I have seen<WH7200> thy face<WH6440>, because thou art yet<WH5750> alive<WH2416>.

And Joseph<WH3130> said<WH559> unto his brethren<WH251>, and unto his father's<WH1> house<WH1004>, I will go up<WH5927>, and shew<WH5046> Pharaoh<WH6547>, and say<WH559> unto him, My brethren<WH251>, and my father's<WH1> house<WH1004>, which were in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, are come<WH935> unto me;
And the men<WH582> are shepherds<WH7462><WH6629>, for their trade hath been to feed cattle<WH4735>; and they have brought<WH935> their flocks<WH6629>, and their herds<WH1241>, and all that they have.
And it shall come to pass, when Pharaoh<WH6547> shall call<WH7121> you, and shall say<WH559>, What is your occupation<WH4639>?

That ye shall say<WH559>, Thy servants'<WH5650> trade<WH582> hath been about cattle<WH4735> from our youth<WH5271> even until now, both we, and also our fathers<WH1>: that ye may dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657>; for every shepherd<WH7462><WH6629> is an abomination<WH8441> unto the Egyptians<WH4714>.
